Half-Life 2...This is THE first person shooter. No PC gamer can say they are one without having played this game. An instant classic, has aged exceedingly well. Holding up against even modern games when it comes to core gameplay.
This game never takes control out of the players hands, even in cutscenes, which play out while your free to walk around the room. 
The characters feel very natural and real. The story is rich with interesting and intriguing lore.
The gameplay is so varied and fun, never a boring moment! Rewarding players for exploration, but not punishing those who just want to get through quickly.

This instantly became one of my top 5 favorite video games. And I'm a picky gamer too.
BEEEEEEEST

This really added a bulk to the original story that really twisted my thinking and made me question a lot of things pertaining to the story and where Gordon Freeman fits in to everything that is going on. The game didn't let down being a sequal and all to the original. If anything I think that it added to the game play tremendously. The mechanics were great, the gameplay was even smoother and more fluid and it really just improved everything that the first part had to offer. Great game you won't regret it.

Welcome. Welcome to City 17. 

You have chosen, or been chosen, to relocate to one of our finest remaining urban centers. I thought so much of City 17 that I elected to establish my Administration here, in the Citadel so thoughtfully provided by Our Benefactors. I have been proud to call City 17 my home. And so, whether you are here to stay, or passing through on your way to parts unknown, welcome to City 17. It's safer here.
